thread.title: "This can be a very mean spirited town": Tillerson bids farewell

title: "This can be a very mean spirited town": Tillerson bids farewell
text:
"This can be a very mean spirited town": Tillerson bids farewell 12:09am IST - 02:12 
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson bid farewell to his staff at the State Department on Thursday and urged them to 'never lose sight' of their personal integrity. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. Secretary of State Rex Tillerson bid farewell to his staff at the State Department on Thursday and urged them to 'never lose sight' of their personal integrity.
